snippet.title: Armed heist - Global release trailer
snippet.description:
Armed Heist is a Third person cover-based action shooter that let players take part of an legendary crime spree. Robbing banks and other valuable locations has never been so much fun!

The CRIME MAP offers a huge range of dynamic jobs, and players are free to choose anything from small-time jewelry store hits, to big-league heists with major bank vaults.

As you progress the jobs become bigger, better and more rewarding. Along with earning more cash, climbing in ranks and becoming a legendary criminal comes a weapons customization system
that lets you build the craziest modified guns you have ever seen.

- - - - -

Download the game from App Store or Google Playstore:
https://kmxh5.app.goo.gl/gp

- - - - -

Follow us on Social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/armedheist/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArmedHeistGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/armedheist/

Join the community:
Discord: https://discord.gg/sozap
